dmca.title: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [66.98.180.177] recipecottage.com Cas
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Copyright [mailto:copyright@topsecretrecipes.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, November 15, 2006 1:13 PM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[66.98.180.177] recipecottage.com Case Number: 8943
Subject: RE: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[66.98.180.177] recipecottage.com Case Number: 8943
Importance: High


Dear Sir,

This issue was supposedly resolved back in June of 2006. Once again, the
infringing material has re-appeared on the website
www.recipecottage.com. 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner
or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain
intellectual property rights, said owner being named Todd Wilbur ("IP
Owner") (http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/theauthor.asp). I have good
faith belief that the materials listed below are not authorized by the
above IP Owner, it's agent, or the law and therefore infringe upon the
IP Owner's rights.  I believe that cashed copies of the web site
http://www.recipecottage.com are hosted on one or more of your server(s)
at www.ev1.net
 
Infringing material:
 
The use of registered trademark "Top Secret Recipes" serial number
2,661,232
here: http://www.recipecottage.com
And this page: http://topsecretrecipes.recipecottage.com/ including the
title of the page. 

Use of copyrighted material listed here: 
http://topsecretrecipes.recipecottage.com/ and accessed through here:
http://www.recipecottage.com
 
Infringed work or right includes any of Todd Wilbur's original recipes,
either from his eight books in publication: 
 "Top Secret Recipes" By Todd Wilbur US Copyright Registration number
TX
3-608-188
"More Top Secret Recipes" By Todd Wilbur US Copyright Registration
number TX
3-978-811
"Top Secret Restaurant Recipes" By Todd Wilbur US Copyright Registration
number TX-4-583-028 " Top Secret Recipes Lite"  By Todd Wilbur US
Copyright Registration number TX 4-931-075 "Low Fat Top Secret Recipes"
By Todd Wilbur US Copyright Registration number TX 5-235-144 "Top Secret
Recipes: Sodas, Smoothies, spirits and Shakes By Todd Wilbur US
Copyright Registration number TX 5-493-002 "Even More Top Secret
Recipes" by Todd Wilbur US Copyright Registration number TX 5-724-207
"Top Secret Restaurant Recipes 2 by Todd Wilbur US Copyright
Registration number TXu-1-198-872
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/store.asp
or any of the recipes he created for his web site located here:
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com.
 
 
I may be contacted at:
 
Pamela Ellis
Vice President; Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
10401 Orkiney Drive
Las Vegas, NV 89144
Email: copyright@topsecretrecipes.com
Telephone: 702-254-8125
Fax: 702-254-8660
 
Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing. Given that
http://.topsecretrecipes.recipecottage.com  is primarily composed, if
not completely composed of infringing material, please disable access to
all cached copies of http://topsecretrecipes.recipecottage.com until
further determination can be made. 
 
We take copyright and trademark infringement very seriously. If you are
not willing to follow the guidelines set forth by the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act, we will be forced to take further legal action. 
 
Truthfully,
Pamela Ellis
Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com
 

-----Original Message-----
From: Everyones Internet DMCA Agent [mailto:dmca@ev1.net]
Sent: Sunday, June 18, 2006 9:45 PM
To: pamela@topsecretrecipes.com
Subject: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [66.98.180.177]
recipecottage.com Case Number: 8943

Your Reference Number: recipecottage.com Our Case Number: 8943


, , . 

Sir, 

We feel that the user in question in this violation has successfully
removed the material in question regarding the abuse complaint and have
closed the case in our records, as of 6/19/2006 12:44:40 AM. 

The offending URL(S) was:  http://www.recipecottage.com. If you have any
questions, please contact us at chrisn@ev1servers.net and
abuse@ev1servers.net.   Referencing 8943

-- 

Regards,
Abuse Team
EV1Servers.net
abuse@ev1servers.net


-----Original Message-----
From: Pamela Ellis [mailto:pamela@topsecretrecipes.com]
Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2006 7:36 AM
To: 'abuse@ev1servers.net'; 'chrisn@ev1servers.net'
Subject: RE: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[66.98.180.177] Case Number: 8893 - NOT RESOLVED!
Importance: High

 
To Whom It May Concern,

This issue is definitely NOT resolved. The words TOP SECRET RECIPES are
still present on this website:

http://www.recipecottage.com

The words are listed as the last item under "miscellaneous" on their
homepage.

This issue will only be considered closed when our trademarked name has
been removed. Either disable access to this page immediately or have the
words removed from this website.

From: Top Secret Recipes, Inc. [mailto:copyright@topsecretrecipes.com]
Sent: Wednesday, May 31, 2006 7:13 AM
To: 'abuse@ev1servers.net'; 'dmca@ev1.net'
Subject: FW: DMCA Complaint - www.recipecottage.com - FINAL NOTICE!!
Importance: High

Dear Sirs,
Per the information on your web site, you seem to adhere to the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act. Nevertheless, after following the DMCA
regulations and informing you of infringements, you have failed to
respond. You are required BY LAW to "remove material from users' web
sites that appears to constitute copyright infringement.". Unless you
address this issue within the next 48 hours, we will be forced to seek
legal action.against www.ev1.net for failure to adhere to DMCA
regulations.

YOUR IMMEDIATE RESPONSE IS REQUIRED.

Pamela Ellis
Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com
"Creating Kitchen Clones of America's Favorite Brand-Name Foods"
 From: Top Secret Recipes, Inc. [mailto:copyright@topsecretrecipes.com]
Sent: Monday, February 27, 2006 2:37 PM
To: customerservice@ev1.net
Cc: copyright@topsecretrecipes.com
Subject: Fw: DMCA Complaint - www.recipecottage.com
Importance: High


To Whom It May Concern,

The DMCA complaint below was sent to you on October 23, 2005. To this
date, we have no resolution of the matter. To my knowledge, the links
below are still active.

Under the terms of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, you are
required to "act expeditiously to disable access to (said) material". It
is also unlawful for you to profit from www.recipecottage.com where a
known infringement occurs.
For more information on the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, click here
http://www.gseis.ucla.edu/iclp/dmca1.htm

Your immediate response and cooperation is requested. 

Sincerely,


Pamela Ellis
Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com
----- Original Message ----- 

From: Top Secret Recipes, Inc. 
To: customerservice@ev1.net
Cc: copyright@topsecretrecipes.com
Sent: Sunday, October 23, 2005 3:55 PM
Subject: DMCA Complaint - www.recipecottage.com


October 24, 2005
 

To Whom It May Concern;
 
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner
or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain
intellectual property rights, said owner being named Todd Wilbur ("IP
Owner") (http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/theauthor.asp). I have good
faith belief that the materials listed below are not authorized by the
above IP Owner, it's agent, or the law and therefore infringe upon the
IP Owner's rights.  I believe that cashed copies of the web site
http://www.recipecottage.com are hosted on one or more of your server(s)
at www.ev1.net

Infringing material:

The use of registered trademark "Top Secret Recipes" serial number
2,661,232, and the use of copyrighted material listed here: 
http://topsecretrecipes.recipecottage.com/ and accessed through here:
http://www.recipecottage.com

Infringed work or right includes any of Todd Wilbur's original recipes,
either from his eight books in publication: 
 
Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1993) More Top Secret Recipes
(Penguin/Putnam 1994) Top Secret Restaurant Recipes (Penguin/Putnam
1997) Top Secret Recipes Lite (Penguin/Putnam 1998) Low Fat Top Secret
Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2000) TSR Sodas, Smoothies, spirits and Shakes
(Penguin/Putnam 2002) Even More Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2002)
The Best of Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2003) Top Secret
Restaurant Recipes II - Registration Number TXu1-198-872
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/store.asp
or any of the recipes he created for his web site located here:
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com.
 
 
I may be contacted at:
 
Pamela Ellis
Vice President; Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
10401 Orkiney Drive
Las Vegas, NV 89144
Email: copyright@topsecretrecipes.com
Telephone: 702-254-8125
Fax: 702-254-8660

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing. Given that
http://.topsecretrecipes.recipecottage.com  is primarily composed, if
not completely composed of infringing material, please disable access to
all cached copies of http://topsecretrecipes.recipecottage.com until
further determination can be made. 
 

Truthfully,
Pamela Ellis
Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com
